page.title: 20Tanterton Area (cont) Games.
page.content: Children going to school also need to use the shops,children from the bigger schools around this area use the "Fish and Chips" shop for most of their dinner, but they also go into the "Spar" shop for mid-morning snacks). They are only allowed to have this privilege if they are responsible for getting back to school on time. There is also a hairdressing salon for men and women. Next door to this,there is a Hard-wear store which sells pet-food, vegetables,tools, children's toys and ornaments. ****** For elastics 2 people stand inside a loop of elastic 2 1/2 metres apart, holding it around their ankles.A 3rd person jumps in and out making patterns while they chant: England,Ireland,Scotland,Wales, Inside,Outside,Donkey's tails.
